item.description:
Host: Sylvia
RSVP by Friday, April 9

Directions and info: Alchemist Lounge website

Casual chic is the word at the Alchemist, a locally owned restaurant and pub in Jamaica Plain. Spend a relaxing hour or two in comfort while enjoying live blues and the terrific menu. Trust me, the food is great--my nephew is the sous chef! There is a full bar to provide the traditional brunch beverages of mimosas or Bloody Marys (or Virgin Marys if you prefer).

A reservation is not required, but itâ€™s a good idea, so please RSVP to Sylvia so that we can have enough seats.

There is free parking in the lot at Centre St. and Spring Park Ave.
MBTA: Bus 39 or 41.
item.name: Blues Brunch at the Alchemist Lounge
